job.title: Site Reliability Engineer (Remote)
job.description: Since 2018, HMBradley has been reshaping the consumer banking experience through transparent financial products that adapt with the customers’ needs over time. We see ourselves as our customers’ long-term financial partner – their trusted resource in getting rich slowly.  In the past year, we’ve raised a $18.25 million Series A and were recognized by Business Insider as one of the best high yield checking accounts of 2021 – and we are just getting started! We’re ready to bring on more curious, customer-centric collaborators to challenge the status quo and implement disruptive ideas.  Here at HMBradley we are energized by bringing our bold ideas to life and maintain the mindset that even small wins are progress and should be celebrated. We are deeply invested in empowering our team to do great things, and have a lot of fun while doing so. If this sounds exciting to you, and you want to help build financial products people will actually want to use, we’d love to have you join us! : Because we’re a small team (for now) and an early stage startup, each new hire has an outsized impact on the company, culture, and product. : We started with our headquarters in Santa Monica, CA, but nowadays our team works from almost anywhere. : More on that below, but we have all the good stuff. The Site Reliability Engineer will report to the VP of Engineering and will be responsible for developing and maintaining the company's infrastructure, proactively researching for improvements and always targeting the highest standards of security.
